availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Van Buren Young was born in 1838. Married Mary R. Bell at Fayette, Kentucky on June 26, 1856. In 1860 Young was a Lawyer on Owingsville, Bath County, Kentucky. He was a Representative in the House of Representatives from 1861 to August 15, 1862. He was the Notary Public in Bath County.

bibl.p: New York City Muster Roll Abstracts, 34th Infantry, p. 374; Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, 1st division, p. 109; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Owingsville, p. 1.
